summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BarberX authentication system including PIN login and password recovery features. All backend APIs working perfectly (15/15 tests passed). Frontend authentication flows tested successfully including PIN login, password recovery, and barber dashboard integration.
passed_tests: Forgot password API working with test codes
PIN login option appears when user has PIN set
PIN login form with 6-digit input working
PIN login successfully redirects to barber dashboard
Barber dashboard loads with proper profile and controls
Sound notification toggle visible in dashboard
Reset password form with 6-digit code input working
Password recovery flow UI working correctly
